bookinfo.title: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor User Guide

abstract.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor (RA) is the JAIN SLEE 1.1 RA for the server-side of IMS Sh Interface, the reference for interactions between the Home Subscriber Server (HSS) and the SIP Application Server (AS) and between the HSS and the OSA Service Capability Server (SCS), in the IMS. It is described in TS29.328 and TS29.329 by 3GPP.
This RA implements the Resource Adaptor Type defined by Mobicents development teams.
